kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
Do you have the templates installed? You can check by running `dotnet new list`. If you installed the templates but they didn't install correctly, you can uninstall them with `dotnet new uninstall kentico.xperience.templates`.
If you haven't installed them yet, you need to follow [the Xperience installation documentation steps](https://docs.kentico.com/x/DQKQC).
There are [several commands available from the .NET CLI](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/tools/dotnet-new-list) for managing templates.
